Title: Her Oath
Text:
Lupa gazes at you intensely, her eyes sparkling with passion.

"I swear by the eternal sun." It's more than a promise, but a testimonial to the lone wolf's raw loyalty and sincerity. She may be yet another soul you salvaged in your long journey. But for Lupa, she's found something she never hadâ€”something that offers the long-awaited release of her anguish and pain. You'll never know what that is, and she won't tell you either. But that's all right. For both of you, this is enough.
